name: Super 20
description:
Twenty is a casual and puzzle game, you start it from "1", merge two same numbers to become a bigger number.You will feel quite easy when the first "5" or "10" was made. But it's really hard to get to the "20"!
You must move fast and be concentrated on it,then you can make it! Can you reach the high score? Get to the "20", Come on and have a try!
